content.question: Caravaggioâ€™s Calling of Saint Matthew was influential on later painters primarily because of his use of

choices.label: tenebrism, which is the dramatic use of light and shadow
linear perspective, which creates an illusion of spatial depth
Biblical narratives retold with the figures in contemporary dress

content.answer: tenebrism, which is the dramatic use of light and shadow

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
